TITLE: Quality Assurance
DEF: Continuously evaluate and improve educational activities
TASK: The Quality Assurance pattern backs a systematic process of evaluating and improving educational programs and institutions to maintain high standards. This pattern becomes instrumental in ensuring students receive a high-quality education, covering aspects such as course evaluations and accreditation. Mitigating prevalent issues such as inconsistent evaluation, lack of stakeholder involvement, and insufficient feedback can effectively harness the pattern's potential for continuous improvement.
